titleStmt.title: To all people to whome this present vvriting shall come, I, Thomas Dovvnes of the citie of Dublin, stationer, send greeting ...
titleStmt.author: Downes, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Notice of intended seizure of books imported into Ireland contrary to the exclusive rights granted Thomas Downes and Felix Kyngston, to print and publish in Ireland.
Place of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
